description: Variation of Conditions 15, 24 , 25, 28, 32, 41, 42 and 43 pursuant to pp dated 19/01/19 ref 2017/5837 [(Variation of condition 15 pursuant to pp dated 18/10/12 ref 2012/1258 (Demolition of all existing buildings. Erection of 5 high density residential buildings, with private, communal and public space and public routes. Car parking (within basement and at grade), cycle parking spaces, community space in centre of site and commercial space (classes A1-A5 (retail, financial and professional services, cafe/restaurant, takeaway, pub/bar and/or B1 office use) at northern end of site. Vehicular accesses from Comyn Rd and Eckstein Rd and emergency access from St John's Hill and Strath Terrace.) to allow: Plot 2: 2 storey increase allowing additional flats and change in tenure to older persons social rent only, removal of basement carparking; Plot 3: 2 story increase to centre tower allowing additional flats and change in tenure to private rent only; Plot 6: 1 storey increase allowing additional flats; Plot 7: additional flats (through internal reconfigurations); Plot 8: loss of flat; Plot 9: 1 storey increase to western section, extension of southern section facing Comyn Rd to close the building gap and removal of corner feature to Comyn Rd to allow additional flats, inclusion of parking below podium level; General alterations to fenestration and finishes to accommodate changes and reconfiguration of carparking resulting in a loss of 28 spaces)] to allow: changes to internal residential layouts resulting in amended residential unit mix (including increase of up to 59 residential units); minor adjustments to the massing, building footprint and height of Plots 3 and 7 (Phase 3) and associated changes to external building fa√ßade of Plots 3, 7 and 8 (Phase 3); reconfiguration of commercial floorspace; alterations to play space and landscape design, servicing arrangements, cycle parking, and provision of plant.
